EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Visiting Pivotal at VMworld 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmworld.com/en/europe/index.html?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRomrfCcI63Em2iQPJWpsrB0B%2FDC18kX3RUvIrqZbQfind1SFJk7a8C6XFRCRt1I9SYVSrDM?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=vmworld-barcelona> Thank you for visiting Pivotal at VMworld 2015 <http://www.vmworld.com/en/europe/index.html>. We hope you enjoyed learning how organisations are adopting cloud native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers.
Did you know that we recently announced our intent to deliver Pivotal Cloud Foundry with the VMware Photon Platform as an integrated solution for Cloud Native Applications <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/next-gen-cloud-native-platform-vmware-photon-pivotal-cloud-foundry>?
This is an exciting moment for us! It signals an important milestone in the evolution of cloud technology. With this solution, companies will fundamentally transform how they deliver and run custom enterprise software for the next decade.
In case you missed our sessions, here is a quick recap:
- Chris Mills gave a talk on
- Accelerating Innovation with Microservices <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/accelerating-innovation-with-microservices> - Keeping Your Developers Happy (whilst keeping your job <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/how-to-keep-your-developers-happy-whilst-keeping-your-job>)
- Shahaf Azriely, hosted a Hands-On Lab on Removing the Barriers <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/removing-barriers-between-dev-and-ops-54230633> for DevOps - Erwan Bornier presented our Cloud Native Runtime Platform <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/cloud-native-runtime-platform-54230410>
You can get a full list of all our talks and presentations here <http://pivotal.io/event/vmworld>.
We also launched a new online destination to begin your cloud native journey. Visit the Cloud Native microsite <http://pivotal.io/cloud-native> to learn why it matters, what it looks like and how to become cloud native.
Want more? Stay in touch with Pivotal and join the conversation on our blogs <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal>, podcasts <http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal>, and on Twitter <https://twitter.com/pivotalcf/>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <http://pivotal.io/event/vmworld-europe>!
The Pivotal Team
